trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The timid Arkasodara is in need of protection.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the timid Arkasodara.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the timid Arkasodara again.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_TODO_02<tab>Survey the designated locations and defeat any enemies you encounter.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the timid Arkasodara.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_TODO_04<tab>Speak with the timid Arkasodara again.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_001<tab>You look pretty strong. Do you think you could help me?
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_002<tab>I need someone to guard me while I gather Agni grass for my medicines.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_003<tab>Its scent is difficult to follow, even for we Arkasodara. I can't concentrate and watch my back at the same time.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_004<tab>Please. I'm afraid some beast will strike me while my guard is down.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_005<tab>I'm in your debt. I'll sniff out some Agni grass, so follow me.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_006<tab><sniff> <sniff> Hmmm... <snuffle>
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_007<tab>There. It's faint, but I can smell the grass from that way. Let's go.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_008<tab>This is it! Agni grass! I'll grab a few bundles, you keep watch. I'd hate to get eaten so close to my goal...
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_009<tab>Stand guard while I gather up this grass.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_010<tab>Thank you for watching over me! I got all sorts of ingredients, even more than I hoped for.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_011<tab>All thanks to you. If you weren't here, I would have been too scared to─ What was that...? Perhaps we should continue our talks back at the Great Work.

TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_012<tab>Whew, we made it back in one piece. I really can't thank you enough. With your brawn and my nose, I got enough Agni grass to solve a whole army's digestive issues.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_013<tab>Having olfactory senses five times as strong as your average Midlander's comes in handy sometimes.
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_014<tab>This place can be a bit much, though. So many smells mingling and clashing, and all of them so strong...
TEXT_AKTKZA025_04204_WEAKARKASODARA_000_015<tab>Anyway, thank you again, kind adventurer. Please, take this.
